name: High School BFFs - Cool Girls Team
name_original: High School BFFs - Cool Girls Team
description:
Do makeover for highschool fashionistas: pick makeup and facial features, shirts, jackets, coats, skirts, pants, hats, hairstyles and accessories. Style cute students without any locks or in-app purchases: all our fashion games are totally free. Just download and play on your Android phone or tablet!

Try that geeky look of a college student with nerdy glasses, brackets and a bunch of intelligent math text books :) Or instead create some popular fashionista image with a prom queen title and a career of a podium supermodel ahead. Or maybe come up with more amazing outfits and looks in this virtual doll salon application. To you as an outfit designer and a beauty expert, only your imagination is the limit. Hide the GUI with the "camera" button, grab a screenshot and share it on your social profile to show off your talents and skills to your classmates.

If you're really into cosplay and makeovers, press "More games" button to check out our new trendy dressup and styling apps.
